六一兒童節.definition: Children's Day (June 1st), PRC national holiday for children under 14

六二五事變.definition: Korean War (dating from North Korean invasion on 25th Jun 1950)

六十四卦.definition: the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (I Ching or Yi Jing) 易經|易经

六合.definition: the six directions (north, south, east, west, up, down); the whole country; the universe; everything under the sun

六合八法.definition: Liuhe Bafa - "Six Harmonies, Eight Methods" - Martial Art

六合區.definition: Luhe district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏

六四.definition: refers to Tiananmen incident of 4th June 1989

六字真言.definition: the six-syllable Sanskrit mantra of Avalokiteshvara bodhisattva (i.e. om mani padme hum)

六安市.definition: Lu'an, prefecture-level city in Anhui Province 安徽省[An1hui1 Sheng3]

六宮.definition: empress and imperial concubines or their residence

六家.definition: Six schools of pre-Han philosophy, as analyzed by 司馬談|司马谈[Si1 ma3 Tan2] (儒家[Ru2 jia1], 道家[Dao4 jia1], 陰陽|阴阳[yin1 yang2], 法家[Fa3 jia1], 名家[Ming2 jia1], and 墨家[Mo4 jia1])

六庫.definition: Liuku or Lutku, capital of Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州 in Yunnan

六庫鎮.definition: Liuku or Lutku, capital of Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州 in Yunnan

六扇門.definition: seat of the government; yamen; (in wuxia stories) special police force

六方最密堆積.pinyin: liu4 fang1 zui4 mi4 dui1 ji1

六日戰爭.definition: the Six-Day War of June 1967 between Israel and its Arab neighbors

六書.definition: Six Methods of forming Chinese characters, according to Han dictionary Shuowen 說文|说文 - namely, two primary methods: 象形 (pictogram), 指事 (ideogram), two compound methods: 會意|会意 (combined ideogram), 形聲|形声 (ideogram plus phonetic), and two transfer methods: 假借 (loan), 轉注|转注 (transfer)

六月.definition: June; sixth month (of the lunar year)

六朝四大家.definition: Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties, namely: Cao Buxing 曹不興|曹不兴[Cao2 Bu4 xing1], Gu Kaizhi 顧愷之|顾恺之[Gu4 Kai3 zhi1], Lu Tanwei 陸探微|陆探微[Lu4 Tan4 wei1] and Zhang Sengyou 張僧繇|张僧繇[Zhang1 Seng1 you2]

六朝時代.definition: the Six Dynasties period (222-589) between Han and Tang

六淫.definition: (TCM) six excesses causing illness, namely: excessive wind 風|风[feng1], cold 寒[han2], heat 暑[shu3], damp 濕|湿[shi1], dryness 燥[zao4], fire 火[huo3]

六畜.definition: six domestic animals, namely: pig, cow, sheep, horse, chicken and dog

六盤山.definition: Liupan Mountains, mountain range in northern China

六盤水.definition: see 六盤水市|六盘水市[Liu4pan2shui3 Shi4]

六盤水市.definition: Liupanshui, prefecture-level city in Guizhou Province 貴州省|贵州省[Gui4zhou1 Sheng3]

六碳糖.definition: hexose (CH2O)6, monosaccharide with six carbon atoms, such as glucose 葡萄糖[pu2 tao5 tang2]

六神.definition: the six spirits that rule the vital organs (heart 心[xin1], lungs 肺[fei4], liver 肝[gan1], kidneys 腎|肾[shen4], spleen 脾[pi2] and gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3])

六神無主.definition: out of one's wits (idiom); distracted; stunned

六經.definition: Six Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Book of Rites 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], the lost Book of Music 樂經|乐经[Yue4 jing1], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1]

六腑.definition: (TCM) the six hollow organs: gallbladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2guang1]

六腳.definition: Liujiao or Liuchiao Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

六腳鄉.definition: Liujiao or Liuchiao Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

六藝.definition: the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4]); another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]

六親.definition: six close relatives, namely: father 父[fu4], mother 母[mu3], older brothers 兄[xiong1], younger brothers 弟[di4], wife 妻[qi1], male children 子[zi3]; one's kin

六親不認.definition: not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives

六親無靠.definition: orphaned of all one's immediate relatives (idiom); no one to rely on; left to one's own devices

六邪.definition: (TCM) six unhealthy influences causing illness, namely: excessive wind 風|风[feng1], cold 寒[han2], heat 暑[shu3], damp 濕|湿[shi1], dryness 燥[zao4], fire 火[huo3]

六陳.definition: food grains (rice, wheat, barley, beans, soybeans, sesame)

六韜.definition: “Six Secret Strategic Teachings”, one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], attributed to Jiang Ziya 姜子牙[Jiang1 Zi3 ya2]

六韜三略.definition: "Six Secret Strategic Teachings" 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1] and "Three Strategies of Huang Shigong" 三略[San1 lu:e4], two of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], attributed to Jiang Ziya 姜子牙[Jiang1 Zi3 ya2]
